description: Very simple, runs very well. Doesn't try to do too much, and does well at its core functions.
summary: Works great, especially for large collections/folders

description: It doesn't let you zoom in or out by default with just the mouse wheel scroll.
summary: Can't zoom in / out by default

description: Il est installé d'origine sur Xubuntu. Ce qui lui manque le plus (pour mon usage) c'est de permettre de ré-enregistrer une image sous un autre format de fichier (ex: .PNG -> .JPG).
summary: Rudimentaire mais suffisant pour la majorité des utilisateurs

description: есть возможность просмотра фото по лок сети
